value.title: MIT built a new reconfigurable AI chip that can reduce electronic waste
value.excerpt: Is this the end of e-waste? MIT engineers have designed a LEGO-like stackable, reconfigurable AI chip that can be snapped onto a device's internal chip.

value.title: Engineers build LEGO-like artificial intelligence chip
value.excerpt: Imagine a more sustainable future, where cellphones, smartwatches, and other wearable devices don't have to be shelved or discarded for a newer model. Instead, they could be upgraded with the latest sensors and processors that would snap onto a device's internal chip—like LEGO bricks incorporated into an existing build.
